name: Eclipse Helper
desc:
In order for enemies to use Eclipse, they must think they're inflicting a negative status or dealing damage.
Eclipse doesn't deal damage normally, so instead it secretly inflicts this status.

desc: (Allows Wind Sword to count as Anima magic at range.)

name: Shove
desc:
Pushes target away from the unit.
(This skill uses the Ability component to link to the Shove item. The Ability component allows this skill to target a unit.)

name: Nihil
desc: Negates the foe's combat skills and Combat Arts. (Skills with the Nihil component are affected by the presence of this skill.)

desc: Nearby foes are less likely to attack this unit.
